Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he holds and the books, paintings and cities that inspire him.
